title: New free champion rotation: Azir, Gnar, Twitch and more!

replies.body: Hi riot i was wondering if u could make a new skin for {{champion:127}} because she has 2 and i have an idea for her its like a galaxy skin so like she is purple and has some nice cool pink and bright colours and stars and like u can make the crystals that she has when she walks like be flowing and her head could be flowing and stuff so yeah thats my cool idea plz riot i reallly want ty if u make this skin or if u make a different one i will be super happy

I agree with this guy. I really want to try out {{champion:8}} but I haven't seen him on rotation since I started playing (2/3 months ago). I also want to try other champions such as {{champion:134}} and {{champion:26}} and maybe some ADCs.

so we don't get a full weeks rotation out of these guys because of the ocean week?
i was having fun playing all these guys
hey riot can u put{{champion:84}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:59}}{{champion:120}} in the next rotation
what time does this tick over?

Generally, by Coordinated Universal Time, it ticks over at midnight every Tuesday, going into Wednesday. If you live in New Zealand, or places near there, you should be playing a different rotation on Wednesday morning to the one you played the night before.
how do you actually get them

Azir and Ashe on the same rotation...again... ;) 

oh and does anyone know how to fix a problem where the download link is broken and the game won't start? I'm on LoL withdraw T_T {{item:3070}}

[Download League of Legends (OCE)](https://signup.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload#)

Seems to be working for me, is this the "download link" you're referring to?

Game won't start? If the Launcher always fail you will need to wait a bit when you open it, until all the pictures are properly loaded onto the Launcher before you hit the "Launch" button.

Not sure if I actually helped anything.

Thank you for replying anyway :) but when I hit download, a broken webpage shows up: http://l3cdn.riotgames.com/Mac_ShellInstaller/OC1/League%20of%20Legends%20OC1.dmg
And by the game not starting I mean when I click on the icon the logo would show up, but the launcher won't show up because "an unspecific error occured".
XD azir and ashe.... well if you can understand the picture with all the champion portraits.

Gnar and Liss are free to play?

Dear Lord, oh the horror, top lane.

And mid has Azir.
